name: Fallen Enchantress: Ultimate Edition
summary:
Includes: 
Fallen Enchantress and the standalone expansion, Fallen Enchantress: Legendary Heroes, the Fallen Enchantress/Fallen Enchantress: Legendary Heroes Map Pack DLC, and the Fallen Enchantress: Legendary Heroes DLC: Battlegrounds, Dead World, Leader Pack, Loot Pack, and Quest Pack
